column5: Hello again.  Yep need more help. ? Heading up to lagoon city for the long weekend, and will be targeting bass,pike,or anything else. Never fished the area before and I know a few of you must of fished there, Would greatly appreiciate any info. you might want to release.  P.S. Just got back from limerick/Menphisto lake and if you require any info. on this lake just pm me. Great lake for Large mouth.  .
